footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Eula | Update Date: 10/06/2022 | Editor: Pile6Zero#6228

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Songs of Broken Pines:__
This weapon has the highest base ATK of any weapon in the game, combined with a substat that gives Physical DMG bonus, passive that gives the entire team ATK speed and additional ATK%, makes it her BIS

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__**ATK% substat weapons:**__
__Wolf's Gravestone Luxurious Sea-lord, Protype Archaic__
Since Eula's damage does not rely on reactions, hiving higher ATK stats and more ATK buffs are very helpful to her damage. That being said, Wolf's Gravestone's passive and naturally high ATK stat as a 5* weapon makes it comparable to her signature weapon. Luxurious Sealord is also a competitive 4* f2p option thanks to it's passive. Prototype Archaic is a last resort if you have no other weapons.
__**Other options:**__
__Serpent Spine__
A battle pass weapon with a CRIT rate substat and  a powerful passive skill that lets it sometimes rival 5* weapons, however due to it's low base ATK you usually need several ATK buffs
__Snow-tombed Starsilver__
A last resort option if you don't have billets/don't want to craft Prototype Archaic, since it is completely free. It's high base ATK + Physical DMG bonus makes it function fairly well, it's passive is especially useful when Rosaria is on the team

fields.value: <sands> ATK% |<goblet>  Physical DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate / CRIT DMG
